00025 #ifndef SYX_PARSER_H
00026 #define SYX_PARSER_H
00027 
00028 #include "syx-types.h"
00029 #include "syx-object.h"
00030 #include "syx-lexer.h"
00031 #include "syx-bytecode.h"
00032 
00033 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00034 
00035 #define SYX_PARSER_MAX_NAMES 0xFF
00036 #define SYX_PARSER_MAX_SCOPES 0xFF
00037 #define SYX_PARSER_MAX_CASCADES 0xFF
00038 
00039 typedef struct SyxParserScope SyxParserScope;
00040 struct SyxParserScope
00041 {
00042   syx_string stack[SYX_PARSER_MAX_NAMES];
00043   syx_int8 top;
00044 };
00045 
00046 typedef struct SyxParser SyxParser;
00047 
00049 struct SyxParser
00050 {
00051   SyxLexer *lexer;
00052   SyxOop method;
00053   SyxOop klass;
00054   SyxBytecode *bytecode;
00055   syx_symbol *instance_names;
00056 
00057   /* private */
00058 
00059   syx_bool _in_block;
00060 
00061   syx_int16 _duplicate_indexes[SYX_PARSER_MAX_CASCADES];
00062   syx_int8 _duplicate_indexes_top;
00063 
00064   SyxParserScope _temporary_scopes[SYX_PARSER_MAX_SCOPES];
00065   syx_int8 _temporary_scopes_top;
00066 
00067   SyxParserScope _argument_scopes[SYX_PARSER_MAX_SCOPES];
00068   syx_int8 _argument_scopes_top;
00069 };
00070 
00071 EXPORT extern SyxParser *syx_parser_new (SyxLexer *lexer, SyxOop method, SyxOop klass);
00072 EXPORT extern void syx_parser_free (SyxParser *parser, syx_bool free_segment);
00073 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_parser_parse (SyxParser *parser, syx_bool skip_message_pattern);
00074 
00075 SYX_END_DECLS
00076 
00077 #endif /* SYX_PARSER_H */
